name: Build Request: Level 20 evil sorc build
author: Eijji

posts.author: Eijji
posts.content: Looking for help making a level 20 evil sorc for PVM and light PVP on a level 20 server. Does not have to be fully sorc but would like to focus on pure offensive spell casting. I would like to somehow mix in a level of shadow dancer for HIPS if it cannot facetank. Has to be an elf. Has to be evil. Server is a low magic server with +5 rare drops. Any help with this would be appreciated, thank you!

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
You can't call that server "low magic",
In fact, I would argue that this is a fairly standard magic level having +5 items at all.

Anyway, Elf & Evil makes it tougher than it should be, Sorcerer 18/ Cleric 1/ Paladin 1, Human/Gnome is so much better.
Sorcerer 19/ Cleric 1 for Divine Shield is okay & can be done Evil & Elf as you want.
Charisma 17 -> 22, Greater Spell Focus on 2 different schools and that's it.
I assume your PW has changed some things for casters/spells for PvP or else it is ridiculous as you can go Timestop -> 3x Isaac's Greater missile storms and obliterate anything that's 20 level.

posts.author: Eijji
posts.content:
How would you build Sorc 19/Cleric 1? 

1st level: Power Attack
3rd (cleric) Divine Shield
rest of the levels greater spell focuses and empower spell

Starting Stats (Elf):

Str: 8
Dex: 15
Con: 14
Wis: 8
Int: 10
Cha: 17

Is this good?

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content: Ignorant but genuine question. If Pally is out of the equation, would Blackguard be worth it? Again, I'm thinking Charisma synergy. However, it does seem mean to shove an elf into Sorcerer rather than Wizard, regardless of alignment

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
He would be worth it if it was a level 40 build but at level 20 you need at least 3 levels to take that Divine Shield so you lose all 9th level spell-casting.
At level 40 however, Sorceress 35/ BG 3/ Monk 2, for example, would be a really good combo.

Eijji, try this instead: Str: 09 Dex: 16 Con: 12 Int: 12 Wis: 08 Cha 17(22)
PA, DS, GSF 1/GSF 2, Empower OR Extend Spell.
And here is why Human is so good, he allows you to take Both of them.
